options.label: Icon
options.description: Instead of using a custom image, you can click on the pencil to pick an icon from the icon library.

options.label: Link
options.description: Enter or pick a link, an image or a video file.

vars.label: Show the link
vars.description: Show or hide content fields without the need to delete the content itself.

cfgs.label: Parallax Offset
cfgs.description: Define the vertical parallax offset in pixels.

cfgs.label: Gutter
cfgs.description: Set the grid gutter width and display dividers between grid cells.

cfgs.label: Phone Portrait
cfgs.description: Set the number of grid columns for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the number of columns on the next smaller screen size.

cfgs.label: Phone Landscape
cfgs.description: Set the number of grid columns for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the number of columns on the next smaller screen size.

cfgs.label: Tablet Landscape
cfgs.description: Set the number of grid columns for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the number of columns on the next smaller screen size.

cfgs.label: Desktop
cfgs.description: Set the number of grid columns for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the number of columns on the next smaller screen size.

cfgs.label: Large Screens
cfgs.description: Set the number of grid columns for each breakpoint. Inherit refers to the number of columns on the next smaller screen size.

cfgs.label: Image Orientation
cfgs.description: Width and height will be flipped accordingly, if the image is in portrait or landscape format.

cfgs.label: Show Title
cfgs.description: Display the title inside the panel, as the lightbox caption or both.

cfgs.label: Show Content
cfgs.description: Display the content inside the panel, as the lightbox caption or both.

cfgs.label: Style
cfgs.description: Select one of the boxed card styles or a blank panel.

cfgs.label: Size
cfgs.description: Define the card's size by selecting the padding between the card and its content.

cfgs.label: Style
cfgs.description: Title styles differ in font-size but may also come with a predefined color, size and font.

cfgs.label: Decoration
cfgs.description: Decorate the title with a divider, bullet or a line that is vertically centered to the heading.

cfgs.label: Color
cfgs.description: Select the text color. If the Background option is selected, styles that don't apply a background image use the primary color instead.

cfgs.label: HTML Element
cfgs.description: Choose one of the six heading elements to fit your semantic structure.

cfgs.label: Style
cfgs.description: Select a predefined meta text style, including color, size and font-family.

cfgs.label: Alignment
cfgs.description: Align the meta text above or below the title.

cfgs.label: Margin
cfgs.description: Set the margin between title and meta text.

cfgs.label: Style
cfgs.description: Select a predefined text style, including color, size and font-family.

cfgs.label: Padding
cfgs.description: Top, left or right aligned images can be attached to the card's edge. If the image is aligned to the left or right, it will also extend to cover the whole space.

cfgs.label: Border
cfgs.description: Select the image's border style.

cfgs.label: Box Shadow
cfgs.description: Select the image's box shadow size.

cfgs.label: Hover Box Shadow
cfgs.description: Select the image's box shadow size on hover.

cfgs.label: Icon Size
cfgs.description: Enter a size ratio, if you want the icon to appear larger than the default font size, for example 1.5 or 2 to double the size.

cfgs.label: Icon Color
cfgs.description: Set the icon color.

cfgs.label: Alignment
cfgs.description: Align the image to the top, left, right or place it between the title and the content.

cfgs.label: Grid Width
cfgs.description: Define the width of the image within the grid. Choose between percent and fixed widths or expand columns to the width of their content.

cfgs.label: Grid Gutter
cfgs.description: Select the gutter width between the image and content items.

cfgs.label: Grid Breakpoint
cfgs.description: Set the breakpoint from which grid cells will stack.

cfgs.label: Vertical Alignment
cfgs.description: Vertically center grid cells.

cfgs.label: Name
cfgs.description: Define a name to easily indentify this element inside the builder.

cfgs.label: ID
cfgs.description: Define a unique identifier for the element.

cfgs.label: Class
cfgs.description: Define one or more class names for the element. Separate multiple classes with spaces.

cfgs.label: CSS
cfgs.description: Enter your own custom CSS. The following selectors will be prefixed automatically for this element: .el-element, .el-item, .el-title, .el-meta, .el-content, .el-image, .el-link
